mn27:13.8: hoti → imassa anantaraṁ so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato ajjhattaṁ anavajjasukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti vacana d ta idha santosakath ca tattha satisampaja
mn27:17.1: imāya ca ariyāya santuṭṭhiyā samannāgato → etthantare pāṭho idha na dissati, catukkaṅguttare pana imasmiṁ ṭhāne dissati, aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ca tadattho pakāsito. tasmā so ettha paṭipūrito. 9M:1388; 10M:1289
